extension.name: Content - ITPGoogleAdSense
extension.author: Todor Iliev
extension.description:
ITPGoogleAdSense is a plugin which adds a Google AdSense on your web page.

Invest in the extension and help for its improvement. You can sponsor the extension via SMS or PayPal.

Subscribe for the newsletter to receive information about updates and new ITPrism extensions.

Please, vote for the extension on Joomla! Extensions Directory

field.name: position
field.label: Position
field.description: A position where you want to put AdSense.

field.name: publisherId
field.label: Publisher ID
field.description: Please, enter your Publisher ID provided by Google AdSense. It is an alphanumerical string like pub-123456789876543. If you do not have an ID, register yourself to Google AdSense.

field.name: slot
field.label: Slot number
field.description: Enter a slot number that is into the AdSense JavaScript code. It is a numerical string like 54656789.

field.name: channel
field.label: Channel number
field.description: Enter a channel number that is part of AdSense JavaScript code.

field.name: format
field.label: AdSense Size
field.description: Choose the ad format and size that you would like to display on your page.

field.name: excludeArticles
field.label: Exclude articles
field.description: List of excluded articles divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of articles.

field.name: excludeCats
field.label: Exclude categories
field.description: List with excluded categories divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of categories.

field.name: includeArticles
field.label: Include in articles
field.description: Displays ads in these articles notwithstanding the exclusion settings. You must enter the IDs of articles.

field.name: blockedIPs
field.label: Blocked IPs
field.description: Enter an IP number that you would like to block. Devide the addresses by comma.

field.name: altMessage
field.label: Message on blocked IP
field.description: Enter a message to show when blocked IPs try to load the page.
